description: The Matheuchelles' Federation, one of the greatest empires in the world's history that currently holds the Hegemony... we are lucky to be on good terms with them. Anyway, the President of Matheuchelles himself is willing to talk with you in the coming days.

options.description: It would be an interesting experience, I guess...
I hope he isn't too talkative.

title: The first phone call
